attributes.action: Elstree and Borehamwood tobe part of GLA
attributes.additional_details:
Reasons:     1.   LCC built Elstree and Borehamwood for Londoner’s, we paid our rates to the LCC. (now the GLA)  2.  TFL zone 6. 3.  020 London phone Number.  4.  Geography. Located approximately 12 miles of central London.  5. We've Nothing in common with Hertforeshire, Our shared interests and family ties are within all the LondonBoroughs.  6.  Metropolitan police, take back our streets.   7.  Better for Local businesses  8.  Better for the poor, old and neediest.   9. Our nearest hospital’s, Barnet General (approximately 1 mile) Edgware(approximately 2.5 miles) Stanmore Orthopaedic (approximately 1.5 mile)   10. Our nearest library other than B/wood is Barnet (approximately 1.5 mile)
  11.  The majority of us work in London.
We want you and the LGBCE to relook at the London boundaries.
